title: 3 and Out - Gruden Props; Chargers' Problems; 'Bama/LSU; Full NFL Week 10 Preview; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Gruden Props; Chargers' Problems; 'Bama/LSU; Full NFL Week 10 Preview; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff looks at the Raiders' big Thursday Night Football win over the Chargers, Gruden continuing to prove critics wrong, why the Chargers continue to under-perform despite a stacked roster, previews this weekend's huge 'Bama/LSU tilt and the slate of Week 10 NFL games. He also answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
